description.narrative: Danida Innovation & Business Explorer (DIBE) offers financial support to Danish companies, including start-ups, that wish to investigate concrete business opportunities contributing to the achievement of the Sustainable Development Goals and the Paris agreement. The general sourcing strategy of Tropica is to either produce and/or source products for the assortment, which makes the company able to supply its customer's with a complete assortment in the highest possible quality all year around. The three main focus areas in the sourcing is quality, pricing, and risk management.

The purpose is to build up a plant supplier focusing on the development of the assortment and an increasing quality, higher volume and security in supplies. The geographic location of a loq cost area like Morocco close to Europe, makes the building of a well runned production unit very attractive. A contact has been established to a supplier, and the ai of the project is to plan a set up where the focus will be to supply the needed plants for Tropica and simultaneously secure the development of the Moroccan business.
